ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic Conveyor Networks
ResearchProjectDef.description: The continual movement of raw resources and final products within a factory is tedious, but crucial. Understanding the fundamentals of conveyor networks is very important to fulfill manufacturing needs and to determine production rates.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic Sorting Systems
ResearchProjectDef.description: Directing things to the proper area of the factory will streamline and diversify the factory layout.\nUnlocks: Simple puller, growzone puller and belt splitter for normal belts.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Sorting Systems
ResearchProjectDef.description: Sophisticated logistical implementation allows for advanced item sorting.\nUnlocks: Wall and underground belts, splitters, smart hoppers, as well as MKII, angle, and wall pullers.
